title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks close higher after March jobs report stokes choppy trading session - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks close higher after March jobs report stokes choppy trading session  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks closed higher Friday to cap a choppy first trading day of April as investors watched a closely-watched recession indicator in the bond market briefly flash red and mulled strong labor market data out of Washington that reaffirmed expectations for more hawkish monetary tightening plans by the Federal Reserve.
